column2: I seem to have become quite muscular. I've gained the Brawny trait.
My mind seems to have become less sharp. I've gained the Dull trait.
I have gained an interest in scholarship. I've gained the Erudite trait.
My lack of muscles has become rather noticeable. I've gained the Frail trait.
I have made an effort to tend to my appearance. I've gained the Groomed trait.
I... can...'t. I... am... Incapable.
Roses are red, violets are blue. I am a Poet, unlike you.
My wound is quite severe. I've gained the Severely Injured trait.
My mind is becoming sharper and sharper. I've gained the Shrewd trait.
Things have to be done my way. I've gained the Stubborn trait.
My body is most certainly not frail. I've gained the Sturdy trait.
I don't really care about tending to my appearance. I've gained the Uncouth trait.
My lack of muscles has become less noticable. I've lost the Frail trait.
My mind is sometimes not in the gutter. I've lost the Lustful trait.
My mind has become somewhat less sharp. I've lost the Shrewd trait.
My appearance has really changed for the better. I've lost the Ugly trait.
My muscles have become rather less pronounced. I've lost the Brawny trait.
My body has become frailer. I've lost the Sturdy trait.
I no longer ignore my appearance quite as much. I've lost the Uncouth trait.
I have started to become slightly more honest. I've lost the Deceitful trait.
I sometimes play by the rules. I've lost the Arbitrary trait.
I have started to learn to control my temper. I've lost the Wroth trait.
My mind has become somewhat sharper. I've lost the Dull trait.
My appearance has started to matter less to me. I've lost the Groomed trait.
I grow impatient. I've lost the Patient trait.
There is a limit to my ambition. I've lost the Ambitious trait.
It is quite clear that I am no longer Celibate.
I no longer care for cruelty for cruelty's sake. I've lost the Cruel trait.
I have started to drink less. I've lost the Drunkard trait.
I no longer envy others quite as much. I've lost the Envious trait.
Scholarship has started to bore me. I've lost the Erudite trait.
My body has regained some of is strength. I've lost the Infirm trait.
I can sometimes agree to a compromise. I've lost the Stubborn trait.
